DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , parallel-group study total 16 evaluable subject . Subjects assign 1 follow cohort : Cohorts I ( subject normal hepatic function ; n+8 Cohort II ( subject moderate hepatic impairment , Child-Pugh classification Grade B ; n=8 ) .
